welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vught, the charming city known for its historic landmarks and beautiful surroundings. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Vught has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Kempen Airport caters to VIP and private charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
